onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,u.details: This function is called at the end of a `safeBatchTransferFrom` after the balances have been updated. IMPORTANT: To accept the transfer(s), this must return `bytes4(keccak256("onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)"))` (i.e. 0xbc197c81, or its own function selector).

params._data: Additional data with no specified format.
params._from: The address which previously owned the token.
params._ids: An array containing ids of each token being transferred (order and length must match _values array).
params._operator: The address which initiated the batch transfer (i.e. msg.sender).
params._values: An array containing amounts of each token being transferred (order and length must match _ids array).

onERC1155Received(address,address,uint25.details: This function is called at the end of a `safeTransferFrom` after the balance has been updated. IMPORTANT: To accept the transfer, this must return `bytes4(keccak256("onERC1155Received(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)"))` (i.e. 0xf23a6e61, or its own function selector).

params._data: Additional data with no specified format.
params._from: The address which previously owned the token.
params._id: The ID of the token being transferred.
params._operator: The address which initiated the transfer (i.e. msg.sender).
params._value: The amount of tokens being transferred.

onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,u.notice: Handles the receipt of multiple ERC-1155 token types.

onERC1155Received(address,address,uint25.notice: Handles the receipt of a single ERC-1155 token type.
